It defines a function apply_my_filters(s) that applies a series of filters to a spectrum object s: default_filters, add_parent_mass, normalize_intensities, select_by_relative_intensity (intensity_from=0.0, intensity_to=1.0), select_by_mz (mz_from=0, mz_to=1000), require_minimum_number_of_peaks (n_required=5).
